items.title: What YA Books Showed Up On The Most “Best Of 2025” Lists?
items.description: Out of the 29 "best of" 2025 YA lists curated by a New York librarian, what's standing out? Dive into the data.

items.title: What’s Your Favorite Queer Book of 2025? (Survey)
items.description: What's your favorite queer book that you read this year? Take this survey and I'll share our recommendations!

items.title: The Bestselling Books of the Week, According to All the Lists
items.description: USA Today, Publishers Weekly, NYT, Amazon, and Indie Booksellers all have their own bestseller lists. Here are the combined results.

items.title: More, More, More: 3 Exciting SFF Sequels Coming in 2026
items.description: Here are three of the most-anticipated sci-fi and fantasy sequels coming out in 2026, from pirates to superheroes to dragon riders!

items.title: 8 Moving and Meaningful Nonfiction Books About Pets
items.description: The next best thing to cuddling a pet is reading about pets, as these meaningful and moving nonfiction books about pets show.
